activities: Windsor Circle provides ecommerce analytics and email marketing integration services to customers worldwide, including in the European Union, for the purpose of retention marketing automation. In connection with the provision of these services, Windsor Circle’s customers may provide it with personal information of individuals located in the European Union.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
